snippet: In a Katie Couric interview, former Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg differed with Bill de Blasio on issues like the St. Patrick’s Day Parade and charter schools.
abstract: Former New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, in interview with Katie Couric for Yahoo News, takes indirect aim at his successor Bill de Blasio; in series of remarks, criticizes de Blasio for his stances on issues like St Patrick’s Day Parade and charter schools.
lead_paragraph: In a Katie Couric interview, former Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg differed with Bill de Blasio on issues like the St. Patrick’s Day Parade and charter schools.

headline.main: Bloomberg Says He Won’t, but Still Criticizes de Blasio
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg Says He Won’t, but Still Criticizes de Blasio
